source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a computer-generated airport. The wide view shows a complex system of runways and taxiways at either sunrise or sunset. The sun is a bright, low orb in a hazy, reddish-purple sky. Subtitles at the bottom display a conversation between air traffic control and a pilot.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides in single file along a winding mountain road, passing through patches of dense fog. As they approach a sharp curve, the lead cyclist signals for the group to slow down, and they all brake in unison before continuing their ascent. In the distance, a cable car moves steadily up the hillside.
